attributes.action: More police officers on the streets
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The bobbie on the beat was internationally known to be an effective way of stopping potential crime, the regular sight of an authority figure is enough to make potential criminals think twice before committing a crime. It is time to see more officers on the street and make this country feel safe in it's own community once more.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
